title: Replace Gold Paper external canister link with internal placeholder page

requirements.summary: Change the header “Gold Paper” navigation item (desktop + mobile) to use internal SPA navigation to /gold-paper, with no external URL behavior.
acceptanceCriteria: From the header (desktop and mobile), clicking “Gold Paper” navigates to `/gold-paper` within the app (no navigation to `https://whu4t-kiaaa-aaaah-qsc5q-cai.icp0.io/`).
The header Gold Paper item is treated as internal navigation (no external-link icon required, no new tab behavior).
No other header navigation items change behavior or styling.

file_operations.description: Replace the current external Gold Paper nav item (which uses the docs canister URL + ExternalLink icon + target=_blank) with an internal TanStack Router <Link> pointing to `/gold-paper` for both desktop and mobile menus; remove the docs canister constants from this header file while keeping all other nav items unchanged.

requirements.summary: Replace /gold-paper page content with a single-line English placeholder message and remove any redirect or content fetching attempts.
acceptanceCriteria: Visiting `/gold-paper` never triggers `window.location.href` changes, timed redirects, or any link to the canister URL.
The page renders only the exact text: “Golden Paper temporarily unavailable – content preserved”.
No additional explanatory text, buttons, canister URLs, spinners, or other UI elements are shown on `/gold-paper`.

file_operations.description: Remove the auto-redirect useEffect, the manual redirect button, any references/constants for the documentation canister URL, and any multilingual/extra UI; ensure the component renders ONLY the exact single line text: “Golden Paper temporarily unavailable – content preserved”.

requirements.summary: Eliminate any remaining Gold Paper entry-point code paths that navigate to the documentation canister root, preventing 503/IC0503 errors triggered by the Gold Paper button.
acceptanceCriteria: There is no remaining user path from the “Gold Paper” button in the header that can navigate to `https://whu4t-kiaaa-aaaah-qsc5q-cai.icp0.io/`.
Clicking “Gold Paper” does not produce a 503 error because it does not attempt to load the non-public canister URL.

file_operations.description: Audit and remove any remaining external-anchor/new-tab behavior or canister URL usage associated with the “Gold Paper” header entry point, ensuring the only action is internal navigation to `/gold-paper`.
Ensure there are zero remaining canister URL references and zero redirect mechanisms (including window.location assignments and timers) within the `/gold-paper` page implementation.
